title: [Neuroscience] Individuals swiftly develop familiarity and preference for musical melodies, particularly when they can anticipate their endings. This process, closely linked to the brainâ€™s auditory and reward systems, varies among individuals based on their sensitivity to musical rewards.

[Medicine] The knowledge, beliefs and attitudes about the psychosocial and medical needs of the transgender community in first-year undergraduate medical students were evaluated after attending a trans health conference. Students increased empathy, knowledge, and understanding of transgender healthcare.
